person.persName: Simon Bolivar Buckner (Westpoint Grad, CSA Brig Gen.)

body.p: Born April 1, 1823 in Hart County, Kentucky. Graduated from WestPoint in 1844. From 1845 to 1846 he became an Assistant Professor of geography, history and ethics at WestPoint. Served in the Mexican American War as a Lieutenant in General Worthâ€™s Division. Inspector General of Kentucky under Governor Magoffin. At the outbreak of war in Kentucky, commissioned in the Confederate Army as a Brigadier General. In command at Fort Donaldson during the Battle of Fort Donaldson in February of 1862. September 20, 1864 promoted to Lieutenant General and served as Chief of Staff for General Edmund Kirby Smith in the Western Theater until the end of the war. Died January 8 1914 in Hart County, Kentucky.
